content.en: Inverter optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the performance of multilevel inverters and reduce harmonic distortions. They have been using algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and particle swarm optimization, to optimize the switching angles and minimize total harmonic distortion (THD). These algorithms are able to find the optimal solutions and achieve selective harmonic elimination in multilevel inverters with reduced switches.
content.da: Inverteroptimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre ydeevnen af multilevel inverters og reducere harmoniske forvrængninger. De har brugt algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og partikel-sværmeoptimering, til at optimere koblingsvinklerne og minimere total harmonisk forvrængning (THD). Disse algoritmer er i stand til at finde de optimale løsninger og opnå selektiv harmonisk eliminering i multilevel inverters med reduceret antal switches.
